description: The risk of an adverse reaction (allergy or intolerance) for this patient upon xposure to the substance (including pharmaceutical products).
name: AllergyIntoleranceSubstanceExposureRisk

text.div:
AllergyIntoleranceSubstanceExposureRisk

The risk of an adverse reaction (allergy or intolerance) for this patient upon xposure to the substance (including pharmaceutical products).

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/allerg-intol-substance-exp-risk
